title: CSS is the language we use to style an ___________ document.
output: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document.

title: CSS is the acronym for?
output: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets

title: External stylesheets are stored in CSS files
output: True, External stylesheets are stored in CSS files

title: HTML element h1 is used in CSS for styling then it is also called a?
output: HTML element h1 is used in CSS for styling then it is also called a selector

title: To show the start and end of HTML element, ______ is used.
output: To show the start and end of HTML element, tag is used.

title: Cascading Style Sheets level 1 (CSS1) came out of W3C as a recommendation in?
output: Cascading Style Sheets level 1 (CSS1) came out of W3C as a recommendation in December 1996

title: In CSS, styling elements can be done by ?
output: In CSS, styling elements can be done by id, class and tag attribute.

title: In CSS, font-size is a property-name which _____________ the font of text.
output: In CSS, font-size is a property-name which increases/decreases the font of text.

title: CSS is created and maintained through a group of people within the W3C called the?
output: CSS is created and maintained through a group of people within the W3C called the CSS Working Group.

title: __________ has introduced text, list, box, margin, border, color, and background properties.
output: CSS is a style sheet language which stands for Cascading Style Sheet. CSS has introduced text, list, box, margin, border, color, and background properties.

title: Which of the following Module is not available in CSS2?
output: The main difference between css2 and css3 is follows : Media Queries, Namespaces, Selectors Level 3, Color.

title: CSS3 is collaboration of CSS2 specifications and new specifications, we can called this collaboration is ?
output: CSS3 is collaboration of CSS2 specifications and new specifications, we can called this collaboration is module

title: Which of the following measurement represent seconds?
output: #a2 {transition-property: color; transition-duration: 1s;}

title: Which of the following Module is not available in CSS3.
output: Explanation: The Document Object Model (DOM) is a programming API for HTML and XML documents. It defines the logical structure of documents and the way a document is accessed and manipulated.

title: What module defines the handling of lists, including marker styles and some aspects of counters?
output: Lists module defines the handling of lists, including marker styles and some aspects of counters.

title: Which of the following property defines the resampling method to use when stretching images?
output: Syntax: image-rendering: auto | inherit

title: Which of the following property is used to apply visual effects to associated elements.
output: Syntax: filter: filtername(filtervalues) ... filtername(filtervalues)

title: column-rule-color property defines the color of any rules between columns in a multicolumn text flow?
output: True, column-rule-color property defines the color of any rules between columns in a multicolumn text flow

title: column-style property is a shorthand definition of the number of columns and their widths in a multicolumn text flow
output: False, columns property is a shorthand definition of the number of columns and their widths in a multicolumn text flow

title: column-rule-style property defines the width of a rule between columns in a multicolumn text flow?
output: column-rule-width property defines the width of a rule between columns in a multicolumn text flow
